leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 医学影像-分割/检测/诊断生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→训练/推理→评测→部署
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 框架 + 标注/数据 + 部署

queries: [WEB] medical image segmentation metrics library github
[WEB] public medical imaging datasets list github

tools.name: DINOv2-3D-Med
tools.one_line_profile: 3D implementation of DINOv2 for self-supervised pretraining on volumetric medical images
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the DINOv2 self-supervised learning method adapted for 3D volumetric medical imaging data, supporting frameworks like MONAI and Lightly.

tools.name: TotalSegmentator-to-nnUNet-format-convert
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to convert TotalSegmentator dataset to nnUNet format
tools.detailed_description: A data processing tool designed to convert the TotalSegmentator dataset structure into the format required by the nnUNet framework for training segmentation models.

tools.name: GEMeX
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale medical VQA benchmark for chest X-ray diagnosis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark dataset and evaluation framework for Medical Visual Question Answering (VQA) focused on chest X-ray diagnosis, offering groundable and explainable metrics.

tools.name: AbdomenAtlas2.0
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale annotated dataset of CT scans for abdominal organ and tumor segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A massive dataset containing over 10,000 CT scans with annotations for 15,130 tumors across six organs, designed to benchmark and train segmentation models for abdominal analysis.

tools.name: BraTS-Algorithms
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of top-performing algorithms from BraTS challenges
tools.detailed_description: A repository hosting implementations of state-of-the-art algorithms for brain tumor segmentation as evaluated in the Brain Tumor Segmentation (BraTS) challenges.

tools.name: adell-mri
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for radiology data segmentation and classification
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library designed for segmentation, classification, object detection, and self-supervised learning specifically on radiology data, developed by the Champalimaud Centre for the Unknown.

tools.name: SurgT_benchmarking
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for 2D trackers in minimally invasive surgery
tools.detailed_description: A dataset and benchmarking suite for evaluating 2D tracking algorithms in the context of Minimally Invasive Surgery (MIS) video data.

tools.name: OSS-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Memory efficient high resolution semantic segmentation for 3D medical data
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of OSS-Net, a network designed for memory-efficient semantic segmentation of high-resolution 3D medical images.

tools.name: bidsme
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible BIDS converter for multimodal datasets
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool to convert and organize multimodal medical imaging datasets into the Brain Imaging Data Structure (BIDS) standard.

tools.name: AMEGA-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for autonomous medical evaluation of guideline adherence in LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking framework (AMEGA-LLM) designed to evaluate Large Language Models on their adherence to medical guidelines.

tools.name: SlicerAutomatedDentalTools
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Slicer extension for automated dental image analysis
tools.detailed_description: A 3D Slicer extension that integrates tools like AMASSS, ALI-CBCT, and ALI-IOS for automated segmentation and landmarking in dental CBCT and IOS scans.

tools.name: M3DA
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Unsupervised Domain Adaptation in 3D Medical Image Segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset and framework for the M3DA challenge, focusing on unsupervised domain adaptation techniques for 3D medical image segmentation.

tools.name: PIPO-FAN
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-organ segmentation model for partially labeled datasets
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of PIPO-FAN, a deep learning method for segmenting multiple organs from datasets with partial labels.

tools.name: UNITOPATHO
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset of H&E-stained patches for colorectal polyps classification
tools.detailed_description: A dataset containing 9536 H&E-stained histopathology patches annotated for colorectal polyps classification and adenomas grading.

tools.name: Medical-Image-Segmentation-Benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of U-shape architecture benchmarks for medical segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A library providing implementations of various U-Net based architectures to serve as benchmarks for medical image segmentation tasks.

tools.name: pubmed-rct
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for sequential sentence classification in medical abstracts
tools.detailed_description: The PubMed 200k RCT dataset, designed for training and evaluating models on sequential sentence classification tasks within medical research abstracts.

tools.name: Apollo
tools.one_line_profile: Multilingual medical LLM with datasets and benchmarks
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive project providing multilingual medical Large Language Models (LLMs), along with associated datasets and benchmarks for evaluating medical AI performance.

tools.name: CMB
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive Medical Benchmark in Chinese
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale benchmark designed to evaluate the medical knowledge and reasoning capabilities of Large Language Models in Chinese.

tools.name: Huatuo-26M
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale Chinese Medical QA Dataset
tools.detailed_description: A massive dataset containing over 26 million Chinese medical question-answer pairs, used for training and fine-tuning medical language models.

tools.name: TotalSegmentator-AIDE
tools.one_line_profile: TotalSegmentator packaged as a MONAI Application Package
tools.detailed_description: A deployment-ready package of the TotalSegmentator tool, wrapped as an AIDE Application using the MONAI Application Package (MAP) standard for easier clinical integration.

tools.name: ISIC-Archive-Downloader
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to download images from the ISIC Archive
tools.detailed_description: A command-line utility to facilitate the bulk downloading of skin lesion images and metadata from the ISIC (International Skin Imaging Collaboration) Archive.

tools.name: RibSeg
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset and point cloud baselines for rib segmentation from CT scans
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset and baseline methods for rib segmentation in CT scans, facilitating research in skeletal structure analysis.

tools.name: ChallengeClinicalQA
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Large Language Models on clinical questioning and answering
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking repository for evaluating the performance of Large Language Models in answering and explaining challenging medical questions.

tools.name: FairFedMed
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for group fairness in federated medical imaging
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking framework for evaluating group fairness in federated learning settings for medical imaging, specifically using FairLoRA.

tools.name: FairSeg
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale medical image segmentation dataset for fairness learning
tools.detailed_description: A dataset designed for fairness learning in medical image segmentation, utilizing the Segment Anything Model with fair error-bound scaling.

tools.name: Harvard-GF
tools.one_line_profile: Retinal nerve disease dataset for fairness learning
tools.detailed_description: The Harvard Glaucoma Fairness dataset, designed for fairness learning and fair identity normalization in retinal nerve disease analysis.

tools.name: ActiveSegmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation framework for benchmarking active learning in 3D segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A framework for simulating and benchmarking various active learning strategies specifically for 3D medical image segmentation tasks.

tools.name: WORD
tools.one_line_profile: Large scale dataset and benchmark for abdominal organ segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive dataset and benchmark for abdominal organ segmentation from CT images, supporting clinical applicability studies.

tools.name: MedImgReg_Survey
tools.one_line_profile: Library of loss functions and metrics for medical image registration
tools.detailed_description: Provides Python implementations of various loss functions and evaluation metrics specifically for learning-based medical image registration, alongside a literature survey.

tools.name: AMOS
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale abdominal multi-organ segmentation benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale benchmark dataset for versatile medical image segmentation, focusing on abdominal multi-organ structures.

tools.name: MedShapeNet
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale dataset of 3D medical shapes
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale dataset collection of 3D medical shapes designed for computer vision and medical image analysis research.

tools.name: segmentation_metrics
tools.one_line_profile: Library to compute medical image segmentation metrics
tools.detailed_description: A Python package dedicated to computing various evaluation metrics for medical image segmentation tasks.

tools.name: MedCLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal CLIP model trained on medical dataset ROCO
tools.detailed_description: A pre-trained multi-modal CLIP model specifically adapted for the medical domain using the ROCO dataset, enabling vision-language tasks in healthcare.

tools.name: ITKPOCUS
tools.one_line_profile: Library for streaming and preprocessing point-of-care ultrasound video
tools.detailed_description: An open-source library designed for the streaming, handling, and preprocessing of point-of-care ultrasound (POCUS) video data.

tools.name: LLD-MMRI-Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for liver lesion diagnosis on multi-phase MRI
tools.detailed_description: An open-access dataset specifically collected for the diagnosis of liver lesions using multi-phase Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI).

tools.name: Medical Question Answer Data
tools.one_line_profile: Medical question and answer dataset
tools.detailed_description: A dataset of medical questions and answers gathered from the web, suitable for training and evaluating medical QA systems.

tools.name: MAMA-MIA
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-center breast cancer DCE-MRI dataset with expert segmentations
tools.detailed_description: A public dataset containing multi-center breast cancer DCE-MRI scans accompanied by expert segmentations for research.

tools.name: LIDC-IDRI-processing
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing scripts for the LIDC-IDRI dataset
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts for preprocessing the LIDC-IDRI dataset, facilitating its use in medical image analysis pipelines.

tools.name: Medical Detection Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: 2D and 3D object detection framework for medical images
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit containing implementations of prevalent object detectors (Mask R-CNN, Retina Net, etc.) optimized for 2D and 3D medical images.

tools.name: MIMIC-CXR Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Code and documentation for the MIMIC-CXR database
tools.detailed_description: Official code repository providing tools, documentation, and examples for working with the MIMIC-CXR chest X-ray database.

tools.name: fastMONAI
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper to simplify deep learning for medical imaging with MONAI
tools.detailed_description: A library that simplifies the use of MONAI for deep learning in medical imaging, providing a higher-level interface similar to fastai.

tools.name: BenchmarkTransferLearning
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking suite for transfer learning in medical image analysis
tools.detailed_description: Official PyTorch implementation and pre-trained models designed to benchmark transfer learning performance across various medical image analysis tasks.

tools.name: medal
tools.one_line_profile: Large medical text dataset for abbreviation disambiguation
tools.detailed_description: A curated large-scale medical text dataset specifically designed for abbreviation disambiguation tasks to support natural language understanding pre-training in the medical domain.

tools.name: MedMNIST
tools.one_line_profile: Standardized datasets for 2D and 3D biomedical image classification
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale MNIST-like collection of standardized biomedical images, including 12 datasets for 2D and 6 datasets for 3D classification, accessible via a Python library.

tools.name: SuPreM
tools.one_line_profile: Supervised pre-trained 3D models for medical image analysis
tools.detailed_description: Provides supervised pre-trained 3D models trained on a large-scale dataset (9,262 CT volumes) to serve as a foundation for various medical image analysis tasks.

tools.name: MedicalSeg
tools.one_line_profile: 3D medical image segmentation toolkit based on PaddlePaddle
tools.detailed_description: An easy-to-use 3D medical image segmentation toolkit that supports the whole segmentation process, including data preprocessing acceleration and high-precision models.

tools.name: MONAI Generative Models
tools.one_line_profile: Generative models library for medical imaging
tools.detailed_description: A MONAI extension that facilitates the training, evaluation, and deployment of generative models (GANs, Diffusion Models) for medical imaging applications.

tools.name: MONAI
tools.one_line_profile: AI Toolkit for Healthcare Imaging
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based, open-source framework for deep learning in healthcare imaging, providing domain-optimized foundational capabilities for data loading, processing, and model training.

tools.name: MONAILabel
tools.one_line_profile: Intelligent image labeling and learning tool
tools.detailed_description: An intelligent open-source image labeling and learning tool that enables users to create annotated datasets and build AI models in an interactive manner.

tools.name: SlicerMONAIViz
tools.one_line_profile: MONAI visualization extension for 3D Slicer
tools.detailed_description: A 3D Slicer extension that enables visualization and interaction with MONAI models and results within the Slicer environment.

tools.name: VISTA
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile Imaging Segmentation and Annotation foundation model
tools.detailed_description: MONAI VISTA (Versatile Imaging Segmentation and Annotation) provides a foundation model approach for robust and versatile medical image segmentation.

tools.name: MONAI Model Zoo
tools.one_line_profile: Repository of pre-trained medical imaging models
tools.detailed_description: A collection of pre-trained models in the MONAI Bundle format, facilitating easy access and reuse of state-of-the-art models for medical imaging tasks.

tools.name: MONAI Deploy
tools.one_line_profile: Standard for developing and deploying medical AI applications
tools.detailed_description: A framework and set of tools to develop, package, test, deploy, and run medical AI applications in clinical production environments.

tools.name: MONAI Deploy App SDK
tools.one_line_profile: SDK for building medical AI applications
tools.detailed_description: Offers a framework and associated tools to design, develop, and verify AI-driven applications in the healthcare imaging domain for deployment.

tools.name: MONAI Deploy Informatics Gateway
tools.one_line_profile: DICOM integration gateway for medical AI workflows
tools.detailed_description: Facilitates integration with DICOM compliant systems, enabling imaging data ingestion and workflow triggering for MONAI Deploy applications.

tools.name: lidc2dicom
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for LIDC-IDRI data to DICOM
tools.detailed_description: Scripts for converting the TCIA LIDC-IDRI collection derived data (XML annotations) into standard DICOM representation.

tools.name: medigan
tools.one_line_profile: Library of pretrained generative models for medical image synthesis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing access to a collection of pretrained generative models (GANs, etc.) for synthetic medical image generation.

tools.name: AgentClinic
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark environment for medical diagnosis agents
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate the performance of AI agents in medical diagnosis tasks.

tools.name: COVID-CT-MD
tools.one_line_profile: COVID-19 CT scan dataset for machine learning applications
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive dataset containing COVID-19 CT scans designed for machine learning and deep learning research, facilitating the development of diagnostic models.

tools.name: medimeta-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Meta-learning toolbox for medical imaging tasks
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based toolbox designed for meta-learning in medical imaging, providing code for working with the MIMeta Dataset and implementing baseline models for diverse tasks.

tools.name: Zhongjing
tools.one_line_profile: Chinese medical LLM based on LLaMa for medical dialogue
tools.detailed_description: A Chinese medical large language model (LLM) fine-tuned on large-scale medical corpora and multi-turn dialogue datasets, designed for medical question answering and dialogue tasks.

tools.name: Data-Science-for-COVID-19
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive COVID-19 dataset and visualization tools for Korea
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing a structured dataset of COVID-19 cases in South Korea along with visualization tools to analyze the spread and patient demographics.

tools.name: MedXpertQA
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for expert-level medical reasoning and understanding
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset designed to evaluate expert-level medical reasoning and understanding capabilities of AI models, presented at ICML 2025.

tools.name: Body-and-Organ-Analysis (BOA)
tools.one_line_profile: CT scan segmentation tool for body composition analysis
tools.detailed_description: A segmentation tool for CT scans that combines TotalSegmentator and Body Composition Analysis to identify structures like bones, muscles, organs, and blood vessels.

tools.name: SAROS Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Sparsely Annotated Region and Organ Segmentation dataset
tools.detailed_description: A large, heterogeneous, and sparsely annotated segmentation dataset on CT imaging data, designed to support research in medical image segmentation with sparse labels.

tools.name: coronavirus-mask-image-dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Image dataset of people wearing medical and non-medical masks
tools.detailed_description: A dataset containing images sourced from Instagram depicting people wearing medical masks, non-medical masks, or no masks, useful for training mask detection models.

tools.name: EvaluateSegmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for evaluating the quality of image segmentations
tools.detailed_description: A command-line program and library to calculate various metrics for evaluating the quality of medical image segmentations against ground truth.

tools.name: medkit-learn
tools.one_line_profile: Environment for medical decision modelling through simulation
tools.detailed_description: A simulation environment for medical decision modeling, allowing for the development and benchmarking of decision-making algorithms in healthcare scenarios.

tools.name: ECG-Expert-QA
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for evaluating medical LLMs in heart disease diagnosis
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset specifically designed to evaluate the performance of Large Language Models (LLMs) in the context of heart disease diagnosis using ECG data.

tools.name: MedQuAD
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale medical question answering dataset
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive medical question answering dataset consisting of 47,457 QA pairs constructed from 12 NIH websites, covering a wide range of medical topics.

tools.name: ReasonMed
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-agent generated dataset for medical reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale (370K) dataset generated by multi-agent systems, designed to advance research in medical reasoning and question answering.

tools.name: medicat
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset of medical images, captions, and textual references
tools.detailed_description: A multimodal dataset containing medical images, captions, subfigure-subcaption annotations, and inline textual references, facilitating research in medical vision-language tasks.

tools.name: MIMIC-CXR-VQA
tools.one_line_profile: Medical Visual Question Answering dataset based on MIMIC-CXR
tools.detailed_description: A collection of medical VQA dataset derived from MIMIC-CXR, designed for multi-modal question answering tasks in electronic health records.

tools.name: MedIAnomaly
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for anomaly detection in medical images
tools.detailed_description: A comparative study and benchmarking framework for anomaly detection methods in medical imaging, providing implementations and evaluation protocols.

tools.name: brat-docker
tools.one_line_profile: Containerized deployment for the Brat annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A Docker container implementation for the Brat Rapid Annotation Tool, facilitating the deployment of text annotation environments for medical NLP.

tools.name: bratreader
tools.one_line_profile: Library for parsing Brat annotation files
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to read and process annotations created with the Brat Rapid Annotation Tool, supporting XML conversion and data access.

tools.name: ARCADE
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark and dataset for the ARCADE MICCAI challenge
tools.detailed_description: Official repository for the ARCADE challenge, providing datasets and evaluation resources for medical image analysis tasks.

tools.name: MultiMedEval
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation toolkit for Medical Vision-Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to evaluate the performance of Vision-Language Models (VLM) specifically on medical domain tasks.

tools.name: ASCENT
tools.one_line_profile: Cardiac ultrasound segmentation and dealiasing toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for cardiac ultrasound image analysis, focusing on segmentation and color-doppler dealiasing tasks.

tools.name: SALMON
tools.one_line_profile: MONAI-based 3D medical image segmentation software
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning segmentation algorithm and software based on the MONAI toolbox, developed for single and multi-label segmentation of 3D medical images.

tools.name: DICOMator
tools.one_line_profile: Blender Add-On for synthetic CT dataset generation
tools.detailed_description: A Blender extension that enables the creation of synthetic CT datasets from 3D meshes, facilitating data augmentation and simulation.

tools.name: ldct-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for low dose CT image denoising
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite for evaluating deep learning-based methods for low dose CT image denoising.

tools.name: SMMILE
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Multimodal Medical In-Context Learning
tools.detailed_description: An expert-driven benchmark designed to evaluate multimodal medical in-context learning capabilities of AI models.

tools.name: miseval
tools.one_line_profile: Metric library for Medical Image Segmentation Evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing a collection of metrics for evaluating medical image segmentation performance.

tools.name: MedAgentsBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for medical reasoning agents
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating thinking models and agent frameworks on complex medical reasoning tasks.

tools.name: TCIA CT Scan Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Head and neck CT scans and segmentations dataset
tools.detailed_description: A dataset provided by Google DeepMind containing head and neck CT scans with segmentations in NRRD format, useful for medical imaging research.

tools.name: brain-tumor-mri-dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for MRI brain tumor dataset management
tools.detailed_description: A set of utilities to download, load, and process MRI brain tumor datasets, providing access to 2D slices and masks.

tools.name: E3C-Corpus
tools.one_line_profile: Multilingual corpus of semantically annotated clinical narratives
tools.detailed_description: A multilingual corpus (Italian, English, French, Spanish, Basque) of clinical narratives with annotations for clinical entities, temporal information, and factuality, designed for benchmarking information extraction systems.

tools.name: SynDeepLesion
tools.one_line_profile: Synthesized DeepLesion dataset for CT metal artifact reduction
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset containing synthesized DeepLesion data specifically designed for developing and evaluating CT metal artifact reduction algorithms.

tools.name: finetuned-qlora-falcon7b-medical
tools.one_line_profile: Falcon-7B LLM finetuned on mental health datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Falcon-7B Large Language Model finetuned using QLoRA on a mental health conversational dataset, serving as a specialized solver for medical dialogue tasks.

tools.name: brats-unet
tools.one_line_profile: UNet implementation for brain tumor segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A reusable implementation of the UNet architecture specifically configured for brain tumor segmentation tasks on the BraTS dataset.

tools.name: BraTS2018-tumor-segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: DeepMedic and 3D UNet integration for brain tumor segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Provides implementations of DeepMedic and 3D UNet for brain tumor segmentation, featuring integration of location information via brain parcellation.

tools.name: LIDC-IDRI-Preprocessing
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing pipeline for the LIDC-IDRI dataset
tools.detailed_description: A dedicated tool for preprocessing the LIDC-IDRI lung nodule dataset, facilitating data preparation for segmentation and detection tasks.

tools.name: LIDC-IDRI-Segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Segmentation solver for LIDC-IDRI dataset
tools.detailed_description: A segmentation implementation for the LIDC-IDRI dataset, designed to work in conjunction with the associated preprocessing pipeline.

tools.name: KiU-Net-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: KiU-Net implementation for 3D medical image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Official PyTorch implementation of KiU-Net, a network architecture designed for accurate segmentation of small anatomical structures in 3D medical images.

tools.name: Chexpert-Solution
tools.one_line_profile: Top-performing solution for CheXpert challenge
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance baseline solver for the CheXpert chest X-ray classification task, representing a state-of-the-art approach for this benchmark.

tools.name: Preprocessed_IXI_Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessed IXI brain MRI dataset with subcortical segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A processed version of the IXI brain MRI dataset, including subcortical segmentation labels, ready for use in segmentation tasks.

tools.name: DeepBrainSeg
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic brain tumor segmentation tool
tools.detailed_description: A fully automatic tool for brain tumor segmentation using deep 3D convolutional neural networks.

tools.name: medical_mae
tools.one_line_profile: Masked Autoencoders for Multi-Label Thorax Disease Classification
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of Medical MAE, a solver for multi-label thorax disease classification using masked autoencoders.

tools.name: SlicerMONAIAuto3DSeg
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Slicer extension for MONAI Auto3DSeg
tools.detailed_description: An extension for the 3D Slicer platform that integrates MONAI's Auto3DSeg models, enabling automated 3D segmentation workflows within the Slicer GUI.

tools.name: SlicerTotalSegmentator
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Slicer extension for TotalSegmentator
tools.detailed_description: A 3D Slicer extension that provides fully automatic total body segmentation capabilities by integrating the TotalSegmentator AI model.

tools.name: MRI-tumor-segmentation-Brats
tools.one_line_profile: MRI brain tumor segmentation implementation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive implementation for MRI brain tumor segmentation, widely referenced as a baseline or tool for BraTS tasks.

tools.name: imcs21
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for Automatic Medical Consultation Systems
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset and framework for automatic medical consultation systems, supporting tasks like medical dialogue generation and understanding.

tools.name: imcs21-cblue
tools.one_line_profile: IMCS21 medical dialogue dataset for CBLUE
tools.detailed_description: The IMCS21 medical dialogue dataset formatted for the CBLUE benchmark, facilitating research in Chinese biomedical language understanding.

tools.name: open_brats2020
tools.one_line_profile: Top-performing solution for BraTS 2020
tools.detailed_description: A high-quality solver for brain tumor segmentation, representing a top solution from the BraTS 2020 challenge, useful as a baseline or reference tool.

tools.name: SAML
tools.one_line_profile: Shape-aware Meta-learning for Prostate MRI Segmentation & Dataset
tools.detailed_description: Provides a shape-aware meta-learning method for domain-generalized prostate MRI segmentation, along with a well-organized multi-site dataset.

tools.name: medpy
tools.one_line_profile: Medical image processing library in Python
tools.detailed_description: A library for medical image processing in Python, providing basic functionalities for reading, writing, and manipulating high-dimensional medical image data.

tools.name: MedDG
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale medical dialogue dataset
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale, high-quality medical dialogue dataset designed for training and evaluating medical consultation systems.

tools.name: MedMCQA
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale multiple-choice question answering dataset for medical entrance exams
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale dataset (194k) designed to address real-world medical entrance exam questions, serving as a benchmark for medical question answering systems.

tools.name: MedTagger
tools.one_line_profile: Collaborative framework for annotating medical datasets
tools.detailed_description: A collaborative framework designed for annotating medical datasets using crowdsourcing, facilitating the creation of labeled data for medical AI models.

tools.name: PromptCBLUE
tools.one_line_profile: Instruction-tuning dataset for Chinese medical multi-task learning
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale instruction-tuning dataset designed for multi-task and few-shot learning in the medical domain, specifically for Chinese language models.

tools.name: InnerEye-CreateDataset
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to transform DICOM data into masks for Deep Learning training
tools.detailed_description: A dataset creation tool associated with the InnerEye-DeepLearning library that converts DICOM data into segmentation masks suitable for training deep learning models.

tools.name: MLCommons Medical
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for medical machine learning tasks
tools.detailed_description: The official medical machine learning benchmark suite from MLCommons, providing standardized tasks and metrics for evaluating medical AI models.

tools.name: MedPerf
tools.one_line_profile: Open benchmarking platform for medical AI using Federated Evaluation
tools.detailed_description: An open benchmarking platform that enables the evaluation of medical artificial intelligence models using federated evaluation techniques to preserve data privacy.

tools.name: TorchXRayVision
tools.one_line_profile: Library of chest X-ray datasets and pre-trained models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library providing unified access to various chest X-ray datasets and pre-trained models for classification, segmentation, and autoencoding tasks.

tools.name: COVID-CTset
tools.one_line_profile: Large dataset of COVID-19 CT scans
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive dataset containing 1252 COVID-19 positive and 1230 negative CT scans, widely used for developing and benchmarking COVID-19 detection models.

tools.name: UltrasoundSnake
tools.one_line_profile: Active contour model tool for ultrasound image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based tool implementing snake (active contour) algorithms specifically for contouring and identifying organ shapes in ultrasound medical images.

tools.name: MedCalc-Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for evaluating LLMs on medical calculations
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset and evaluation framework designed to assess the performance of Large Language Models on medical calculation tasks.

tools.name: AMID
tools.one_line_profile: Library for loading and handling medical imaging datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python library (Awesome Medical Imaging Datasets) that provides a unified interface to download, load, and preprocess various public medical imaging datasets.

tools.name: BraTS-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for preprocessing and segmenting glioma MRI scans
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit for the preprocessing, segmentation, and fusion of glioma MRI scans, specifically designed for the BraTS challenge datasets.

tools.name: DDR-dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for Diabetic Retinopathy classification and segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose, high-quality dataset designed for diabetic retinopathy classification, lesion segmentation, and lesion detection tasks.

tools.name: brat
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based tool for text annotation
tools.detailed_description: The brat rapid annotation tool is a web-based environment for collaborative text annotation, widely used for creating labeled datasets in medical NLP.

tools.name: pylidc
tools.one_line_profile: ORM and utility library for the LIDC-IDRI dataset
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing an Object Relational Mapping (ORM) and utility functions to easily query and analyze the LIDC-IDRI lung nodule dataset.

tools.name: STU-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale pre-trained medical image segmentation model
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale pre-trained medical image segmentation model (1.4B parameters) trained on a massive dataset, serving as a foundation model for segmentation tasks.

tools.name: dicom-database
tools.one_line_profile: Dockerized DICOM storage and transfer service
tools.detailed_description: A Dockerized storage and send/receiver for DICOM images, intended to easily work with pydicom datasets for medical imaging data management.

tools.name: Medical-Detection3d-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Landmark detection engine for 3D medical images
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for 3D medical image landmark detection, serving as an engine for processing medical imaging data.

tools.name: LIDC-IDRI-Toolbox-python
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for processing the LIDC-IDRI lung cancer dataset
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed to facilitate the handling and processing of the LIDC-IDRI dataset for lung cancer and nodule analysis.

tools.name: ROCO Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Radiology Objects in COntext (ROCO) multimodal image dataset
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale multimodal image dataset focusing on radiology objects in context, designed for training and evaluating medical imaging models.

tools.name: CARES
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark of trustworthiness in medical vision language models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite for evaluating the trustworthiness of medical vision language models (Med-VLMs).

tools.name: Med-Banana-50K
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for text-guided medical image editing
tools.detailed_description: A diversified large-scale dataset specifically designed for the task of text-guided medical image editing.

tools.name: pymia
tools.one_line_profile: Data handling and evaluation package for medical image analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing flexible data handling and evaluation tools for deep learning-based medical image analysis.

tools.name: medical-nlp
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for medical NLP with clinical vocabulary
tools.detailed_description: A dataset for Natural Language Processing using a corpus of medical transcriptions and custom-generated clinical stop words and vocabulary.

tools.name: bratutils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for manipulating BRAT annotation files
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utilities for manipulating data and calculating inter-annotator agreement in brat annotation files, commonly used in biomedical NLP.

tools.name: MedAlign
tools.one_line_profile: Clinician-generated dataset for instruction following with EMRs
tools.detailed_description: A dataset designed for instruction following tasks involving electronic medical records (EMR), generated by clinicians.

tools.name: standoff2conll
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from BRAT standoff to CoNLL format
tools.detailed_description: A tool for converting biomedical text annotations from the brat-flavored standoff format to the CoNLL format used in NLP tasks.

tools.name: MedAgentBench
tools.one_line_profile: Virtual EHR environment to benchmark medical LLM agents
tools.detailed_description: A realistic virtual Electronic Health Record (EHR) environment designed to benchmark the performance of medical Large Language Model (LLM) agents.

tools.name: CheXpert Labeler
tools.one_line_profile: NLP tool to extract observations from radiology reports
tools.detailed_description: An NLP tool developed to extract clinical observations from radiology reports, used to generate labels for the CheXpert dataset.

tools.name: dicom-viewer
tools.one_line_profile: 3D DICOM medical dataset viewer
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for viewing medical datasets in 3D, specifically designed for DICOM files.

tools.name: A-Eval
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for cross-dataset and cross-modality evaluation of abdominal multi-organ segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark framework designed to evaluate abdominal multi-organ segmentation models across different datasets and modalities, facilitating robust performance assessment.

tools.name: GMAI-MMBench
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive multimodal evaluation benchmark for general medical AI
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate General Medical AI models across various multimodal tasks, ensuring comprehensive assessment of model capabilities in medical contexts.

tools.name: GMAI-VL
tools.one_line_profile: Large vision-language model and multimodal dataset for general medical AI
tools.detailed_description: Provides a large-scale vision-language model and a comprehensive multimodal dataset aimed at advancing General Medical AI research and development.

tools.name: IMIS-Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset and baseline for interactive medical image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset and baseline framework specifically designed for evaluating interactive medical image segmentation models.

tools.name: STU-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale pre-trained medical image segmentation model
tools.detailed_description: A scalable U-Net based model (STU-Net) pre-trained on a massive collection of medical images, offering high-performance segmentation capabilities.

tools.name: UNet-Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for revisiting model scaling in 3D medical image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking framework that investigates the effects of model scaling on U-Net architectures for 3D medical image segmentation tasks.

tools.name: 3MDBench
tools.one_line_profile: Medical multimodal multi-agent dialogue benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark designed to evaluate multi-agent dialogue systems in medical contexts, involving multimodal data interactions.

tools.name: DeepLesion_manual_test_set
tools.one_line_profile: Manually annotated test set for DeepLesion dataset
tools.detailed_description: Provides a manually annotated test set with 3D lesion boxes for the DeepLesion dataset, serving as a ground truth resource for evaluation.

tools.name: VinDr Lab
tools.one_line_profile: Data platform for medical AI dataset management and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive platform enabling the building of high-quality medical datasets with advanced annotation features and lean processes for AI development.

tools.name: cardiac_dataset_transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to reorganize DICOM cardiac datasets into standard image formats
tools.detailed_description: A utility that transforms DICOM-based cardiac datasets into traditional image dataset structures to facilitate easier usage with deep learning dataloaders.

tools.name: TotalSegmentator
tools.one_line_profile: Robust segmentation tool for over 100 anatomical structures in CT/MR
tools.detailed_description: A powerful tool for automatic and robust segmentation of more than 100 important anatomical structures in CT and MRI images.

tools.name: cxr-baselines
tools.one_line_profile: Baselines for radiology report generation on MIMIC-CXR
tools.detailed_description: Provides baseline models and code for generating radiology reports using the MIMIC-CXR chest x-ray dataset.

tools.name: SFADA-GTV-Seg
tools.one_line_profile: Source-Free Active Domain Adaptation for GTV Segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Source-Free Active Domain Adaptation (SFADA) method for Gross Tumor Volume (GTV) segmentation across multiple hospitals.

tools.name: CMExam
tools.one_line_profile: Chinese National Medical Licensing Examination dataset and LLM benchmarks
tools.detailed_description: A dataset derived from the Chinese National Medical Licensing Examination, accompanied by benchmarks for evaluating large language models in medical contexts.

tools.name: Havard-Medical-Image-Fusion-Datasets
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of medical image fusion datasets (CT-MRI, PET-MRI, SPECT-MRI)
tools.detailed_description: A repository hosting Harvard Medical Image Fusion Datasets, including pairs for CT-MRI, PET-MRI, and SPECT-MRI fusion tasks.

tools.name: PMC-VQA
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale medical visual question-answering dataset
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale dataset for medical visual question-answering containing 227k VQA pairs covering various modalities and diseases.

tools.name: EMLDDMM
tools.one_line_profile: Robust medical image registration using EM-LDDMM
tools.detailed_description: A tool for robust medical image registration using Expectation-Maximization Large Deformation Diffeomorphic Metric Mapping (EM-LDDMM), handling differing contrasts and missing data.

tools.name: TriALS
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for segmentation challenges incorporating nnUNet and other baselines
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking framework that incorporates nnUNet, SAMed, Mamba variants, and MedNeXT to establish standardized baselines for medical segmentation challenges.

tools.name: LHU-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Lean Hybrid U-Net for volumetric medical image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of LHU-Net, a cost-efficient and high-performance hybrid U-Net architecture for volumetric medical image segmentation.

tools.name: BenchX
tools.one_line_profile: Unified benchmark framework for medical vision-language pretraining on Chest X-Rays
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark framework designed to evaluate medical vision-language pretraining models specifically on Chest X-Ray datasets.

tools.name: MedAgentBoard
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for multi-agent collaboration in medical tasks
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark designed to evaluate the performance of multi-agent collaboration systems against conventional methods across diverse medical tasks.

tools.name: MEDFAIR
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking fairness for medical imaging
tools.detailed_description: A framework and benchmark for evaluating fairness in medical imaging algorithms, addressing bias and generalization issues.

tools.name: MedSegBench
tools.one_line_profile: Library providing 35 standardized medical segmentation datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that standardizes and provides easy access to 35 different medical segmentation datasets across various modalities.

tools.name: cMedQA
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for Chinese community medical question answering
tools.detailed_description: A dataset specifically collected for research in Chinese community medical question answering systems.

tools.name: cMedQA2
tools.one_line_profile: Updated dataset for Chinese community medical question answering
tools.detailed_description: The second version of the cMedQA dataset, providing an updated and expanded collection for Chinese medical question answering research.

tools.name: SAT-DS
tools.one_line_profile: Tool and repository to build a large-scale medical segmentation dataset collection
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing tools to build SAT-DS, a massive collection of over 72 public segmentation datasets, standardizing them for large-scale training.
